tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Blog_posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  author_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title TEXT NOT NULL,
  content TEXT,
  author_id INT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  post_id INT,
  author_id INT,
  content TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    content TEXT,
    author_id INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Posts (
  post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  author VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Tags (
  tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tag_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PostCategories (
  post_id INT,
  category_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE PostTags (
  post_id INT,
  tag_id INT
)
